Text: AWESOME EZ! Thank you so much. You uploaded the first dpi, so I'm getting them all the episodes from you, if you would be so kind!

I appreciate the uploads of this series very much. One question though, I read somewhere where all 13 episodes were available to view one after the other on Netflixs? So my question would be do u have all the episodes to upload and are u just uploading them as u get them? That's actually 2 questions ;)
